profile.title: Profile
profile.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.
profile.confirmSignOut: Are you sure you want to sign out?
profile.reauthRequired: Please re-enter your password to continue
profile.reauthError: Authentication failed. Please check your password.
profile.guestWelcome: Sign in to access your profile and enhanced features
profile.guestBrowsing: You're currently browsing as a guest. Sign in for enhanced features.
profile.verifyPasswordSubtitle: Please enter your password to continue with account deletion.
profile.accountDeletedMessage: Your account has been successfully deleted. All your data has been permanently removed.
profile.authRequiredMessage: For security reasons, you need to verify your password before deleting your account.
profile.networkErrorMessage: Unable to delete profile due to network issues. Please check your connection and try again.
profile.accountNotFoundMessage: Your account may have already been deleted. You will be logged out.
profile.deleteFailedMessage:
Failed to delete profile: {{error}}

Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.
profile.authFailedMessage: Failed to authenticate. Please check your password and try again.
profile.authSuccessfulMessage: You have been re-authenticated. Please try deleting your profile again.

auth.dontHaveAccount: Don't have an account? Sign Up
auth.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
auth.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters

auth.signupError: Sign up failed. Please try again.
auth.resetPasswordError: Failed to send reset email. Please try again.
auth.forgotPasswordSubtitle: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
auth.resetEmailSent: We've sent a password reset link to:
auth.resetEmailInstructions: Click the link in the email to reset your password. The link will expire in 1 hour.
auth.didntReceiveResetEmail: Didn't receive the email? Check your spam folder or try again.
auth.signInSubtitle: Sign in to your account to access enhanced features
auth.checkEmailVerification: Please check your email and click the verification link to complete your registration.
auth.guestBrowseInfo: You can browse charging stations without an account! Sign in for enhanced features.
auth.orContinueAsGuest: Or continue browsing as a guest

auth.passwordNoCommon: Avoid common patterns and repeated characters
auth.verificationEmailSentTo: We've sent a verification email to:
auth.didntReceiveEmail: Didn't receive the email? Check your spam folder or try signing in again.
auth.signUpSubtitle: Join us to access enhanced features and personalize your experience

errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.authUserNotFound: No account found with this email address
errors.authWeakPassword: Password should be at least 6 characters long

errors.authTooManyRequests: Too many failed attempts. Please try again later
errors.authNetworkRequestFailed: Network error. Please check your connection
errors.authAccountExistsWithDifferentCredential: An account already exists with the same email address but different sign-in credentials

errors.authCredentialAlreadyInUse: This credential is already associated with a different user account
errors.authTimeout: Request timed out. Please try again
errors.authQuotaExceeded: Quota exceeded. Please try again later
errors.authInvalidActionCode: Invalid verification code. Please request a new one
errors.authExpiredActionCode: Verification code has expired. Please request a new one

errors.tooManyRequests: Too many requests. Please try again later.

emailVerification.title: Verify Your Email
emailVerification.subtitle: We've sent a verification email to:
emailVerification.instruction3: 3. Return to this app - we'll detect verification automatically
emailVerification.helpText:
• Check your spam/junk folder
• Make sure you entered the correct email
• Wait a few minutes for the email to arrive
• We automatically check your verification status
• Pull down to refresh this screen
emailVerification.noUserFound: No user found. Please sign in again.
